participant_1.background:
I'm single now, but my longest relationship lasted for three years.
I will continue to share my love of comic books and animals with others through my blog.
I couldn't be a school teacher like my father because I'm blind.
sometimes i wish i didn t have to wake up in the morning.
I'm still exploring my cultural heritage.

participant_2.background:
I wake up in a different hotel every morning, and I spend my day exploring new places and meeting new people
i spend an hour getting ready in the morning.
I am a person who loves the cold weather and enjoys living in rural Wisconsin.
My parents are proud of me, even though they don't understand my job.
I have to find a way to get my siblings to take the cure.

content.text: Hey there, what do you do for a living?
I am an adventurer. I travel the world and explore new places.
That sounds so exciting! I wish I could do that.
I love it! I've been to so many amazing places and met so many interesting people.
What's the most interesting place you've ever been?
That's a tough question! I've been to so many incredible places, but I think I'd have to say Antarctica. It was so beautiful and peaceful.
I've always wanted to go to Antarctica! It sounds like an amazing place.
It really is! You should definitely go sometime.
I hope I can make it there someday.
Thanks! What do you do for fun when you're not traveling?
I love to read, play video games, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a great way to relax.
It is! I love being able to just unwind and enjoy my time.
It sounds like you have a great life.
I do! I'm very grateful for everything I have.
